comments:
This is most likely a case where the type of an EReference was set to be an
EDataType rather than an EClass, so it's probably a case of a UML association
from a class to a <<datatype>>.  When I try this: 

[UML Diagram]
Class A unidirectional association to a class B stereotyped <<datatype>>

I get this exception 
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.emf.ecore.impl.EDataTypeImpl 
  at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.impl.EReferenceImpl.basicGetEReferenceType(EReferenceImpl.java:477)

  at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.impl.EReferenceImpl.eIsSet(EReferenceImpl.java:244) 
  at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EContentsEList$FeatureIteratorImpl.hasNext(EContentsEList.java:340)

  at
org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.presentation.EMFProjectWizard$PackagePage.validate(EMFProjectWizard.java:2484)
This will be fixed in the next drop.
